item.title: Report I-2023120065
item.description:
Report I-2023120065

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-16
  • City: Erlanger
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 12/16/2023, during the cargo processing, a package was reported as damaged. Upon further inspection, the inner packaging was broken and released all contained commodity. This incident occurred at the CVG HUB, 236 Wendell H Ford Blvd, Erlanger KY 41018. Transportation by air has been confirmed.

item.title: Report X-2023120843
item.description:
Report X-2023120843

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The cap began to leak and QA was called. We cleaned up the spilled product with absorbent pads, secured the cap and placed the package in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Cap leaked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Cap was tightened and package was placed in a lined red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120879
item.description:
Report X-2023120879

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The caps on the bottles came loose and an internal leakage occurred. Upon being found, the item was brought to QA to be worked on. DescribePack: The package was leaking when it was brought to QA. When the package was opened, the caps on the bottles were noted to be loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The contents were placed in a spill tote to prevent further leakage.
